content: RE: http://www.military.com/forums/0,15240,191601,00.html It is impossible to effectively protect the American People and carry out this nations vital missions around the world with a U.S. Navy of so few ships. I honestly don't believe the U.S. Navy alone bears the brunt of the responsibility for this most unfortunate situation. This deplorable situation has all the "Red Flags" associated with the ineptitude of our Washington Politician's !!! The American People are of course aware that their most beloved & proud Navy have for some time now not had enough ships to do their vital job !!! But this latest planned attempt to reduce the numbers even further..... is sheer insanity ! Absolute Insanity !!! The American People deserve so much better ! Thank You L. F.

title: Shipbuilding Program is a Mess
